imageDecryptEval: (function(){ var s = _encryptedString; var debug = []; try { /* 1. 检查当前脚本块长度 */ debug.push('TAG_LEN: ' + s.length); /* 2. 探测变量名匹配情况 (去掉了 var 限制) */ var m = s.match(/(_[a-zA-Z0-9]+)xnz\s*=/); if (m) { debug.push('FOUND_VAR: ' + m[1]); var target = m[1] + 'xnz'; /* 3. 探测赋值语句个数 */ var assignRegex = new RegExp(target + "\\s*=\\s*['\"]([^'\"]+)['\"]", "g"); var count = 0; var lastDataLen = 0; var match; while ((match = assignRegex.exec(s)) !== null) { count++; lastDataLen = match[1].length; } debug.push('ASSIGN_COUNT: ' + count); if (count > 0) debug.push('LAST_DATA_PREVIEW: ' + s.substring(s.indexOf(target)).substring(0, 50)); } else { debug.push('NO_XNZ_PATTERN'); } } catch (e) { debug.push('ERROR: ' + e.message); } return JSON.stringify(debug); })()
